name: Roll.io
description:
"Where Am I? In a city?! Oh hi~ you little cute car! Oops, I'm sorry!"

The ball crushed a car accidentally, however, the ball seems to getting bigger!

That's interesting, let's see how big it can get and crash everything in your sight!

You can also crash other player's ball which is smaller than yours!

Now, time to roll over the amazing city!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but very attractive
* Lots of interesting levels
* Beat other players and stay alive
